headline: Stocks to Watch as the U.S. & China Reach a Trade Deal
summary: Stocks surged on Monday as the U.S. and China announced a deal to temporarily reduce their high reciprocal tariffs, leading to much optimism that a global economic recession may be avoided.

raw.headline: Stocks to Watch as the U.S. & China Reach a Trade Deal
raw.summary: Stocks surged on Monday as the U.S. and China announced a deal to temporarily reduce their high reciprocal tariffs, leading to much optimism that a global economic recession may be avoided.

headline: Retailers get tariff relief ahead of key selling periods
summary: Retail stocks continue to surge on news that the US and China agreed to slash tariffs for 90 days, offering relief ahead of key selling periods for retailers. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma joins Market Domination Overtime to break down how the tariff pause is impacting major retailers like Dicks Sporting Goods (DKS), Amazon (AMZN), and Target (TGT). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.

headline: Retail gains, Wayfair upgrade, NRG Energy $12 billion deal
summary: Yahoo Finance host Julie Hyman tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including gains in retailers Target (TGT), Five Below (FIVE), RH (RH); Wayfair (W) received an Upgrade from Argus Research; NRG Energy (NRG) is acquiring 18 natural gas plants from LLS Power in a $12 billion deal aimed at boosting earnings growth. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: US-China tariff pause may save the year for retailers
summary: Retailers can sigh a bit of relief as Chinese tariffs are paused, at least until August.

headline: Target, Astera Labs, Kindly MD: Trending Tickers
summary: Wealth host Brad Smith outlines some of today's trending stories. Target (TGT) was downgraded to Underperform from Market Perform by Bernstein analysts, citing the retailer's "difficult trade-off" between sales and margins. Astera Labs (ALAB) was upgraded to Overweight by Morgan Stanley, saying the stock's recent decline is a good entry point. Kindly MD (KDLY) stock skyrockets after announcing a merger with Nakamoto Holdings. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.

headline: The U.S.-China trade thaw is helping Target’s stock today. Some analysts still see problems with no obvious solutions.

headline: Ford, GM, & Stellantis; retail stocks; Shopify: Trending Tickers
summary: Catalysts host Madison Mills takes a look at some of the trading session's top stories. US automaker stocks Ford (F), General Motors (GM), and Stellantis (STLA) are gaining on tariff negotiation progress. Retail stocks, like Nike (NKE), Lululemon (LULU), and Target (TGT), are also popping on the temporary US–China tariff cooldown. Shopify (SHOP) is set to replace software company MongoDB (MDB) on the Nasdaq 100 index (^NDX) on May 19. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.

headline: Target Down 25% in 3 Months: Time to Buy, Hold or Sell TGT Stock?
summary: Target struggles with soft demand and margin pressure. With few near-term drivers, investors may prefer caution as the retail giant works through headwinds.

headline: Bernstein downgrades Target stock ahead of Q1 print on near-term headwinds
summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein downgraded Target stock to Underperform from Market-Perform, pointing out a combination of near-term headwinds and structural challenges that threaten its longer-term growth and profitability.
